snippet: In most years, the Yankees are the team that wreaks havoc on the free-agent marketplace. But this off-season, they are seeing the market price them out of the most attractive deals.
abstract: New York Yankees, fearful of luxury tax penalties in 2014, are seeing market price them out of the most attractive free agents, causing them to set priorities as they try to fill many holes on their roster.
lead_paragraph: In most years, the Yankees are the team that wreaks havoc on the free-agent marketplace. But this off-season, they are seeing the market price them out of the most attractive deals.

headline.seo: Yankees Find They Can’t Bear the Market
headline.main: Yankees Find They Can’t Bear the Market
headline.print_headline: Needs to Fill, but Probably at a Lower Price
